subject: The painted one.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I had a big gap on the FM sweep, so added a switch and trimpot to adjust
the sweep levels for each band--not shown in these videos. Box 53, June
2009. in '1700 at 10 seconds "taking this box". In '1701 at 4 seconds "he
made this box". It's a RS Arm Band tuner. This is the box for shipping with
four others.

 F-S

I had a big gap on he FM sweep, so added a swi ch and impo o adjus he sweep le els o each band--no shown in hese ideos. Box 53, June 2009. in '1700 a 10 seconds " aking his box". In '1701 a 4 seconds "he made his box". I 's a RS A m Band une . This is he box o shipping wi h ou o he s. 

 
 F-S
